participant_1.background:
I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people.
I love playing guitar but sometimes I spend too much time practicing and not enough time with my family.
I'm a fast driver in my red car.
I love listening to music while I work in my flower shop, it helps me get in the zone.
i am a grandparent at 44.

participant_2.background:
I work as a stay at home mom, which allows me to spend lots of time with my kids.
My clumsiness often causes me to trip over my own feet, but I always try to laugh it off.
I have a rocking chair in my granddaughter's nursery.
I once saw a massive elephant while on a safari in Africa.
I'm passionate about playing video games and spending time with my dogs.

content.text: What's your favorite song to play on your guitar?
I love playing "Strawberry Swing" by Coldplay.
Oh, that's a great song. I really like the guitar solo.
Yeah, it's so catchy! I love singing along to it.
Me too! I used to play it in my band all the time.
Really? That's awesome! What kind of band was it?
We were a rock band. We played mostly cover songs, but we had a few originals too.
That sounds really cool. I've always wanted to be in a band.
It was a lot of fun. We played a lot of shows and met some great people.
That's awesome! I'm glad you had a good time.
Thanks! I miss it sometimes, but I'm happy with my job now.
I'm sure you are. It sounds like you're really passionate about it.
I am. I love being able to travel and meet new people.
That's great. I'm glad you're happy with your life.
Thanks! I am. I hope you're happy with yours too.
I am. I have a great family and a good job. I couldn't ask for more.
That's great to hear. I'm glad you're happy.
